# twilight

The goal of twilight is to provide an R wrapper for the sun/moon rise/set data at [http://aa.usno.navy.mil/data/docs/RS_OneYear.php](http://aa.usno.navy.mil/data/docs/RS_OneYear.php)

## Example

```{r example}
library(twilight)
sunsetrise_yr(year = 2015,
              lon_deg = 80,
              lon_min = 26,
              lat_deg = 25,
              lat_min = 5,
              tz = 5)
```
